```{r}
autos = cars
n = 50
X = matrix(rep(1,100),nrow=50, ncol=2)
X[,2] = autos$speed
y = autos$dist
```

# Calculo los tetas correspondientes

```{r}
teta = solve(t(X)%*%X)%*%t(X)%*%y
```

```{r}
plot(X[,2],y)
lines(X[,2], X%*%teta, col='red')
```

```{r}
residuos = sum((y - X%*%teta)**2)
Scuad = 1/(n-2)*residuos

```
